Obama to impose strict tariffs on Chinese tires -- latimes.com
 
 Undoubtedly despite rising unemployment and falling real wages, the Obama administration feels consumers still have it too good. And while draconian fines for failing to buy healthcare insurance is one sure way to pound living standards lower, pushing up tire costs is another.
 
 To pre-empt the inevitable economically illiterate response:
 Yes, this will save jobs in the (obviously uncompetitive) tire industry
 It will also cost jobs in every other industry. Consumers blowing an extra couple of hundred dollars on new tires can't spend that money on something else.
 
 There's also the added benefit of XXXXXXX off China.

post_info.post_title: Consumers penalised for benefit of corporates and union members
